name: BPT Bike Share
tagline: An api for easing the implementation of a bike rental system.
body:
### We provide the basic functionality your program will need to get off the ground
 ![rack](http://imgur.com/VaFb0e3).

### User Focused
- Map of docking stations
- Bike availability
- Rewards balance

### Security
- Electronic lock
- Instant reports on docking stations

### Bike Database
- Tracks maintenance, and issues
- Inventory

### Payment System
- Modern card carriers
- Paypal
- Square readers

### Authors and Contributors
Alaa, Carlos, Karen!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
